FOLDER.NAME: EDWTD_REV_MEASURE
FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: This folder will have all the informatica objects related GL and INV REVENUE MEASURE table load process for rel3.0 Approvers:Kathy Kwong, Murali Marni, Geetha Bhakta

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, DV_EFFECTIVE_DTM, CASE WHEN SO_CNT > 1 THEN 'MIX' ELSE SALES_MOTION_CD END SALES_MOTION_CD, USER EDW_CREATE_USER, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) EDW_CREATE_DTM FROM ( SELECT SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, SALES_MOTION_CD, MAX(DV_EFFECTIVE_DTM) OVER(PARTITION BY SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY) AS DV_EFFECTIVE_DTM, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY) SO_CNT, SUM(DV_ALLOCATION_PCT) OVER(PARTITION BY SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY) DV_ALLOCATION_PCT FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.MT_SUMMARY_QUOTE_SOL_ALLOC WHERE DV_EXPIRATION_DTM = '3500-01-01 00:00:00' AND SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY IN ( SELECT SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.MT_SUMMARY_QUOTE_SOL_ALLOC WHERE EDW_UPDATE_DTM > ( SELECT LAST_EXTRACT_DATE FROM $$ETLVWDB.CTL_ETL_LAST_EXTRACT_DATES WHERE JOB_STREAM_ID = 'wf_WI_REV_SCA_NRT_SMR_TV' AND TABLE_NAME = 'WI_AR_SUMMARY_QUOTE_SMR' ) ) /* For identifying all open records for a particular allocation change*/ ) WI WHERE DV_ALLOCATION_PCT = 1.00 AND NOT EXISTS ( SEL 1 FROM $$STGDB.WI_AR_SUMMARY_QUOTE_SMR_PRE PRE WHERE PRE.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY = WI.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY AND PRE.SALES_MOTION_CD=WI.SALES_MOTION_CD) GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT APPL.SALES_CREDIT_ASSIGNMENT_KEY, APPL.SCA_SOURCE_TYPE_CD, APPL.SK_LINE_SEQ_ID_INT, APPL.SS_CD, APPL.EP_SRC_LINE_ID_INT , APPL.EP_SK_SALESREP_ID_INT, APPL.SCA_SALES_COMMISSION_PCT, APPL.START_TV_DTM, APPL.END_TV_DTM, APPL.SCA_SRC_COMMIT_DTM , APPL.EDW_CREATE_DTM, APPL.EDW_UPDATE_DTM, CASE WHEN APPL.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY > 0 THEN APPL.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY ELSE -9999 END AS SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY, APPL.RU_AR_TRANSACTION_LINE_KEY, APPL.EP_SK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_ID_INT, APPL.EP_SK_TERRITORY_ID_INT, CASE WHEN APPL.SS_CD = 'CG' THEN NSCTT.SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_QUOTA_FLAG ELSE ESCT.QUOTA_FLAG END AS QUOTA_FLAG, CASE WHEN APPL.SS_CD = 'CG' THEN APPL.BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE ELSE ESCT.NAME END AS BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE, CASE WHEN ( NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100 ) < (NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100) THEN NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT ELSE NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT END AS BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT , CASE WHEN ( NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100 ) < (NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100) THEN NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT ELSE NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT END AS BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT , CASE WHEN ( NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100 ) < (NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100) THEN (NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN_SYS.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100) ELSE ( NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT+NFISMN.BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT *100 ) END AS DV_FISCAL_YEAR_MONTH_NUM_INT , NULL AS EVENT_TYPE , APPL.SALES_REP_NUMBER , APPL.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY , APPL.SK_SC_AGENT_ID_INT, APPL.SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID , APPL.TOTAL_SPLIT_PCT , APPL.SALES_MOTION_CD , APPL.BK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT FROM (SELECT LAST_EXTRACT_DATE FROM $$ETLVWDB.DW_JOB_STREAMS WHERE JOB_STREAM_ID ='wf_WI_REV_SCA_NRT_SMR_TV') X, ( SELECT BK_FISCAL_MONTH_NUMBER_INT, BK_FISCAL_YEAR_NUMBER_INT FROM $$COMREFVWDB.N_FISCAL_MONTH WHERE Current_Date-1 BETWEEN FISCAL_MONTH_START_DATE AND FISCAL_MONTH_END_DATE ) NFISMN_SYS , $$STGDB.WI_REV_SCA_NRT_SNAP_SMR_TV APPL INNER JOIN $$COMREFVWDB.N_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODES NSSC ON APPL.SS_CD = NSSC.SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN $$ETLVWDB.EL_SALES_CREDIT_TYPES ESCT ON ESCT.SK_CREDIT_TYPE_ID = APPL.EP_SK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_ID_INT AND ESCT.GLOBAL_NAME = NSSC.GLOBAL_NAME LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE, SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_QUOTA_FLAG FROM $$SLSORDVWDB.N_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_TV QUALIFY Row_Number () Over (PARTITION BY BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE ORDER BY END_TV_DATE DESC)=1 ) NSCTT ON APPL.BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE = NSCTT.BK_SALES_CREDIT_TYPE_CODE INNER JOIN $$COMREFVWDB.N_FISCAL_MONTH NFISMN ON APPL.SCA_SRC_COMMIT_DTM BETWEEN NFISMN.FISCAL_MONTH_START_DATE AND NFISMN.FISCAL_MONTH_END_DATE WHERE 1=1 AND APPL.EDW_UPDATE_DTM > X.LAST_EXTRACT_DATE AND APPL.EDW_CREATE_DTM > X.LAST_EXTRACT_DATE AND END_TV_DTM = '3500-01-01 00:00:00' AND EXISTS ( /* case-1 - when a match is found in N_AR_BATCH_SOURCE - then it must NOT be XAAS related - THIS SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO FLOW THROUGH */ SELECT 1 FROM $$FINLGLVWDB.N_AR_TRX_LINE NART INNER JOIN $$FINLGLVWDB.N_AR_TRX NAT ON NART.AR_TRX_KEY = NAT.AR_TRX_KEY INNER JOIN $$FINLGLVWDB.N_AR_BATCH_SOURCE NABS ON NAT.AR_BATCH_SOURCE_KEY = NABS.AR_BATCH_SOURCE_KEY WHERE 1=1 AND NART.AR_TRX_LINE_KEY=APPL.RU_AR_TRANSACTION_LINE_KEY AND (NABS.BK_BATCH_SOURCE_NAME NOT LIKE ('%WEBEX%') AND ( NABS.BK_BATCH_SOURCE_NAME NOT LIKE ('%XAAS%','CSP-MARKETPLACE') OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM $$ETLVWDB.EL_XAAS_TRX_FROM_ERP_SC EL WHERE EL.AR_TRX_LINE_KEY = NART.AR_TRX_LINE_KEY) /* Q2FY19 Dec Rel : Included above cond. to consider XAAS trx from ERP SC */ ) ) ) /* Not to pull any incremental records for which no SC changes are there */ AND NOT EXISTS ( SEL 1 FROM $$STGDB.WI_REV_SCA_NRT_SMR_PRE PRE WHERE (CASE WHEN APPL.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY > 0 THEN APPL.SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY ELSE -9999 END) = (CASE WHEN PRE.RU_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY > 0 THEN PRE.RU_SALES_ORDER_LINE_KEY ELSE -9999 END) AND APPL.RU_AR_TRANSACTION_LINE_KEY=PRE.RU_AR_TRANSACTION_LINE_KEY AND APPL.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY=PRE.SALES_TERRITORY_KEY AND APPL.SALES_REP_NUMBER=PRE.SALES_REP_NUMBER AND APPL.SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID=PRE.SK_RTR_ATTRIBUTION_ID AND APPL.BK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT =PRE.BK_OFFER_ATTRIBUTION_ID_INT AND APPL.TOTAL_SPLIT_PCT =PRE.TOTAL_SPLIT_PCT AND APPL.SALES_MOTION_CD =PRE.SALES_MOTION_CD )
